data.title: RDIE41 - The Dog Island
data.meta_description: Nintendo Wii games database, with information and artwork in all languages, including Japanese, Korean and Chinese.
data.text: synopsis (EN)Imagine that you're on an island full of dogs. In The Dog Island for Nintendo Wii, you play as a dog whose brother/sister falls ill one day. In order to help your brother/sister, you head to an island in search of a legendary flower. The game includes stages in grass planes, snowy fields and even deserts. You can also choose your dog from a variety of breeds. This is an adorable adventure for kids, based on the best-selling franchise 'THE DOG'.
